name: -webkit-text-fill-color
description: Specifies a fill color for text.
longDescription: If not specified, the color specified by the color property is used. -webkit-fill-color is commonly used in combination with -webkit-text-stroke. Changes to this property can be animated.

<color>.description: The fill color. Colors can be specified with a constant, an RGB value, or a hexadecimal value.

values.currentcolor: The value of the elementâ€™s color property.
values.-webkit-activelink: The default color of a hyperlink that is being clicked.
values.-webkit-focus-ring-color: The color that surrounds a UI element, such as a text field, that has focus.
values.-webkit-link: The default color of a hyperlink that has been visited.
